LuaScript:
--[[ Lua code. See documentation: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/ --]]

--[[ The onLoad event is called after the game save finishes loading. --]]
SELECT_CHARACTER = {
  position = vector(53, 10, 0),
  pitch    = 25,
  yaw      = 90,
  distance = 40
}

SELECT_BOARD_VIEW = {
  position = vector(-57, 11, 0),
  pitch    = 25,
  yaw      = 270,
  distance = 40
}

INTERIM_VIEW = {
  position = vector(0, 10.5, 0),
  pitch = 25,
  yaw = 0,
  distance = 0
}

BOARD_LOCATION = vector(0,1,0)

BOARD_ZONE = "6267ca"

STATUE_GUIDS = {
  "87163d", "6c95a9", "ee8d06", "451ac4", "d6c1cb", "2ad8be", "cf83de", "e6a71c", "98030e", "5b9219"
}

BOARD_DISPLAY_GUIDS = {
  "1de9ab", "65165b", "cbf799", "8c9e8b", "f626a5", "a1f138"
}

PLAYER_COLORS = {}

STATUE_UNLOCK = false

function onLoad()
  for i,s in ipairs(Player.getAvailableColors()) do
    PLAYER_COLORS[s] = i
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(STATUE_GUIDS) do
    local statue = getObjectFromGUID(v)
    statue.reload()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(BOARD_DISPLAY_GUIDS) do
    local board = getObjectFromGUID(v)
    --print(v)
    board.reload()
  end
end

function checkPlayerColor(color)
  return PLAYER_COLORS[color] ~= nil
end

function selectCharacter(player, option, id)
  if PLAYER_COLORS[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a character.")
      return
    end
  end
  Player[player.color].lookAt(SELECT_CHARACTER)

end

function selectBoardView(player, option, id)
  if PLAYER_COLORS[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a board.")
      return
    end
  end
    Player[player.color].lookAt(SELECT_BOARD_VIEW)
end

function resetView(player, option, id)
  if PLAYER_COLORS[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a character.")
      return
    end
  end
  RESET_VIEW = {
    pitch    = 45,
    yaw      = Player[player.color].getHandTransform().rotation.y,
    distance = 65
  }
  Player[player.color].lookAt(RESET_VIEW)
end

currentBoardGUID = ""
currentBagGUID = ""
function SetBoard(params)
  putAwayBoard()
  Wait.frames(function() getOutBoard(params.bag) end, 10)
end

function getOutBoard(bag)
  currentBag = getObjectFromGUID(bag)
  currentBagGUID = bag
  params = {
    callback_function = function(board) handleBoard(board) end,
    smooth = false,
    position = vector(0,100,0)
  }
  if #currentBag.getObjects() > 0 then
    currentBag.takeObject(params)
  end
end

function handleBoard(board)
  Wait.frames(function()
    currentBoardGUID = board.guid
    board.setPosition(BOARD_LOCATION)
    board.interactable = false
   end, 3)
end

pieceList = {}
function addPiece(params)
  obj = params.piece
  print(obj.guid)
  table.insert(pieceList, #pieceList + 1, obj)
end

function clearPieces()
  for i,v in ipairs(pieceList) do
    if(v~=nil)then
      destroyObject(v)
    end
  end
  pieceList = {}
end

function clearTable()
  boardZone = getObjectFromGUID(BOARD_ZONE)
  for _,x in ipairs(boardZone.getObjects()) do
    destroyObject(x)
  end
end

function putAwayBoard()
  currentBag = getObjectFromGUID(currentBagGUID)
  currentBoard = getObjectFromGUID(currentBoardGUID)
  if currentBag ~= nil and currentBoard ~= nil then
    currentBag.putObject(currentBoard)
  end
  --print(#pieceList)
end

function resetEverything()
  putAwayBoard()
  clearTable()
end

function lockBag(params)
  bag = getObjectFromGUID(params.bag)
  bag.setPosition(params.position)
  bag.setLock(true)
  --bag.interactable = false
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
  self.interactable = Global.getVar("STATUE_UNLOCK")
end

function chooseCharacter(player, option, id)
  playerColors = Global.getTable("PLAYER_COLORS")
  if playerColors[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a character.")
      return
    end
  end
  params = {
    callback_function = function(deckbox) handleDeckbox(deckbox, player.color) end,
    smooth = false,
    position = vector(0,100,0)
  }
  self.takeObject(params)
end

function handleDeckbox(deckbox, color)
  Wait.frames(function() openDeckbox(deckbox, color) end, 10)
end

function openDeckbox(deckbox, PlayerColor)
foo = getObjectFromGUID(deckbox.guid)
  params = {player_color = PlayerColor}
  deckbox.call('openDeckbox', params)
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
PieceCoordTable = {
    ['Deck'] = vector(0,0,0),
    ['Hero'] = vector(0,0,3),
    ['Sidekick'] = vector(2,0,0),
    ['Hero Health'] = vector(0,0,-5),
    ['Sidekick Health'] = vector(2,0,-5),
    ['Bonus Token'] = vector(-3,0,0)
}

function relocate(player_color)
  position = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().position
  rotation = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().rotation
  offset = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward
  reverse = vector(0,180,0)
  offsetRatio = 10
  dropPoint = position + offset * offsetRatio
  dropPoint.y = 1
  self.setRotation(rotation + reverse)
  self.setPosition(dropPoint)
end

function onRandomize(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
  --unloadContents(player_color)
end

function onDrop(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
end

function openDeckbox(params)
  relocate(params.player_color)
  unloadContents(params.player_color)
end

function unloadContents(player_color)
  contents = self.getObjects()
  count = #contents
  origin = self.getPosition()
  stackHeights = {
    ['Deck'] = 0,
    ['Hero'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick'] = 0,
    ['Hero Health'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick Health'] = 0,
    ['Bonus Token'] = 0
  }
  sidekickHealth = 0
  for i,v in ipairs(contents) do
    if contents[i].description == 'Sidekick Health' then
      sidekickHealth = 2
    end
  end
  while (#self.getObjects() > 0) do
    objects = self.getObjects()
    nextObject = objects[1]
    objDesc = nextObject.description
    mod = PieceCoordTable[objDesc]

    stackHeights[objDesc] = stackHeights[objDesc] + 1
    if(objDesc == 'Hero Health') then
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * (mod.x - sidekickHealth)
    else
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * mod.x
    end
    yMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().up * (mod.y + stackHeights[objDesc])
    zMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward * mod.z
    newPosition = origin + xMod + yMod + zMod
    newRotation = objDesc == 'Deck' and self.getRotation() + vector(0,0,180) or self.getRotation()
    newPiece = self.takeObject({
      position          = newPosition,
      index             = 0,
      rotation          = newRotation
    })
    --Global.call("addPiece", {piece = newPiece})
  end
    destroyObject(self)

    -- Bag or Deck returns {{string name, string description, string guid, int index, string lua_script, string lust_script_state}, ...}
end

function vectorAdd(v1, v2)
  X = v1[1] + v2[1]
  Y = v1[2] + v2[2]
  Z = v1[3] + v2[3]
  return vector(X,Y,Z)
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
CONFIG = {
    MIN_VALUE = 0,
    MAX_VALUE = 9,
    FONT_COLOR = {0,0,0,100},
    FONT_SIZE = 450,
    LABEL_SIZE = 400,
    LABEL_FONT_COLOR = {0,0,0,100},
    LABEL_BG_COLOR = {100,100,100,10},
    COLOR_HEX = "#402050",
    TOOLTIP_SHOW = true,
    VALUE = 9,
}

INJECTED_COUNTER = true
function onload(saved_data)
  CONFIG.VALUE = CONFIG.MAX_VALUE
  Wait.time(createAll, 1, 0)
end
function hexToRGB(hex)
    hex = hex:gsub("#","")
    R = tonumber(hex:sub(1,2),16)/255
    G = tonumber(hex:sub(3,4),16)/255
    B = tonumber(hex:sub(5,6),16)/255
    result = {r=R,g=G,b=B,a=100}
    return result
end
function createAll()
    if CONFIG.TOOLTIP_SHOW then
        ttText = self.getName().. ": " .. CONFIG.VALUE
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end
    local scale = {x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5}
    local thickness = self.getBoundsNormalized().size.y
    if self.name == "Custom_Tile" then
        thickness = thickness*2
        scale = {0.75, 0.75, 0.75}
    end
    self.createButton({
        label = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE),
        click_function = "doNothing",
        tooltip=ttText,
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,thickness/2,-1.6},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = CONFIG.LABEL_SIZE,
        scale=scale,
        font_color= hexToRGB(CONFIG.COLOR_HEX),
        color = CONFIG.LABEL_BG_COLOR
        })
    self.createButton({
        label=">",
        click_function="add",
        tooltip="+",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0.6, thickness/2, -1.7},
        height=400,
        width=200,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=CONFIG.FONT_SIZE,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
    self.createButton({
        label="<",
        click_function="subtract",
        tooltip="-",
        function_owner=self,
        position={-0.6, thickness/2, -1.7},
        height=400,
        width=200,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=CONFIG.FONT_SIZE,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
    self.createButton({
        label="RESET",
        click_function="reset",
        tooltip="Reset Health",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0, thickness/2, -2.5},
        height=100,
        width=400,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=20,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function doNothing(_obj, _color, alt_click)
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.editInput({value = self.getName()})
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(CONFIG.VALUE + mod, CONFIG.MIN_VALUE), CONFIG.MAX_VALUE)
    if CONFIG.VALUE ~= new_value then
        CONFIG.VALUE = new_value
        updateVal()
    end
end

function add(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    add_subtract(_obj, _color, false)
end

function subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    add_subtract(_obj, _color, true)
end

function reset(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    CONFIG.VALUE = CONFIG.MAX_VALUE
    updateVal()
end

function updateVal()
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE)
        })
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    if CONFIG.TOOLTIP_SHOW then
        ttText = self.getName().. ": " .. CONFIG.VALUE
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
  self.interactable = Global.getVar("STATUE_UNLOCK")
end

function chooseCharacter(player, option, id)
  playerColors = Global.getTable("PLAYER_COLORS")
  if playerColors[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a character.")
      return
    end
  end
  params = {
    callback_function = function(deckbox) handleDeckbox(deckbox, player.color) end,
    smooth = false,
    position = vector(0,100,0)
  }
  self.takeObject(params)
end

function handleDeckbox(deckbox, color)
  Wait.frames(function() openDeckbox(deckbox, color) end, 10)
end

function openDeckbox(deckbox, PlayerColor)
foo = getObjectFromGUID(deckbox.guid)
  params = {player_color = PlayerColor}
  deckbox.call('openDeckbox', params)
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
PieceCoordTable = {
    ['Deck'] = vector(0,0,0),
    ['Hero'] = vector(0,0,3),
    ['Sidekick'] = vector(2,0,0),
    ['Hero Health'] = vector(0,0,-5),
    ['Sidekick Health'] = vector(2,0,-5),
    ['Bonus Token'] = vector(-3,0,0)
}

function relocate(player_color)
  position = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().position
  rotation = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().rotation
  offset = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward
  reverse = vector(0,180,0)
  offsetRatio = 10
  dropPoint = position + offset * offsetRatio
  dropPoint.y = 1
  self.setRotation(rotation + reverse)
  self.setPosition(dropPoint)
end

function onRandomize(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
  --unloadContents(player_color)
end

function onDrop(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
end

function openDeckbox(params)
  relocate(params.player_color)
  unloadContents(params.player_color)
end

function unloadContents(player_color)
  contents = self.getObjects()
  count = #contents
  origin = self.getPosition()
  stackHeights = {
    ['Deck'] = 0,
    ['Hero'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick'] = 0,
    ['Hero Health'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick Health'] = 0,
    ['Bonus Token'] = 0
  }
  sidekickHealth = 0
  for i,v in ipairs(contents) do
    if contents[i].description == 'Sidekick Health' then
      sidekickHealth = 2
    end
  end
  while (#self.getObjects() > 0) do
    objects = self.getObjects()
    nextObject = objects[1]
    objDesc = nextObject.description
    mod = PieceCoordTable[objDesc]

    stackHeights[objDesc] = stackHeights[objDesc] + 1
    if(objDesc == 'Hero Health') then
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * (mod.x - sidekickHealth)
    else
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * mod.x
    end
    yMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().up * (mod.y + stackHeights[objDesc])
    zMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward * mod.z
    newPosition = origin + xMod + yMod + zMod
    newRotation = objDesc == 'Deck' and self.getRotation() + vector(0,0,180) or self.getRotation()
    newPiece = self.takeObject({
      position          = newPosition,
      index             = 0,
      rotation          = newRotation
    })
    --Global.call("addPiece", {piece = newPiece})
  end
    destroyObject(self)
    -- Bag or Deck returns {{string name, string description, string guid, int index, string lua_script, string lust_script_state}, ...}
end

function vectorAdd(v1, v2)
  X = v1[1] + v2[1]
  Y = v1[2] + v2[2]
  Z = v1[3] + v2[3]
  return vector(X,Y,Z)
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
PieceCoordTable = {
    ['Deck'] = vector(0,0,0),
    ['Hero'] = vector(0,0,3),
    ['Sidekick'] = vector(2,0,0),
    ['Hero Health'] = vector(0,0,-5),
    ['Sidekick Health'] = vector(2,0,-5),
    ['Bonus Token'] = vector(-3,0,0)
}

function relocate(player_color)
  position = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().position
  rotation = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().rotation
  offset = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward
  reverse = vector(0,180,0)
  offsetRatio = 10
  dropPoint = position + offset * offsetRatio
  dropPoint.y = 1
  self.setRotation(rotation + reverse)
  self.setPosition(dropPoint)
end

function onRandomize(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
  --unloadContents(player_color)
end

function onDrop(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
end

function openDeckbox(params)
  relocate(params.player_color)
  unloadContents(params.player_color)
end

function unloadContents(player_color)
  contents = self.getObjects()
  count = #contents
  origin = self.getPosition()
  stackHeights = {
    ['Deck'] = 0,
    ['Hero'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick'] = 0,
    ['Hero Health'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick Health'] = 0,
    ['Bonus Token'] = 0
  }
  sidekickHealth = 0
  for i,v in ipairs(contents) do
    if contents[i].description == 'Sidekick Health' then
      sidekickHealth = 2
    end
  end
  while (#self.getObjects() > 0) do
    objects = self.getObjects()
    nextObject = objects[1]
    objDesc = nextObject.description
    mod = PieceCoordTable[objDesc]

    stackHeights[objDesc] = stackHeights[objDesc] + 1
    if(objDesc == 'Hero Health') then
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * (mod.x - sidekickHealth)
    else
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * mod.x
    end
    yMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().up * (mod.y + stackHeights[objDesc])
    zMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward * mod.z
    newPosition = origin + xMod + yMod + zMod
    newRotation = objDesc == 'Deck' and self.getRotation() + vector(0,0,180) or self.getRotation()
    newPiece = self.takeObject({
      position          = newPosition,
      index             = 0,
      rotation          = newRotation
    })
    --Global.call("addPiece", {piece = newPiece})
  end
    destroyObject(self)

    -- Bag or Deck returns {{string name, string description, string guid, int index, string lua_script, string lust_script_state}, ...}
end

function vectorAdd(v1, v2)
  X = v1[1] + v2[1]
  Y = v1[2] + v2[2]
  Z = v1[3] + v2[3]
  return vector(X,Y,Z)
end

CONFIG = {
    MIN_VALUE = 0,
    MAX_VALUE = 16,
    FONT_COLOR = {0,0,0,100},
    FONT_SIZE = 450,
    LABEL_SIZE = 400,
    LABEL_FONT_COLOR = {0,0,0,100},
    LABEL_BG_COLOR = {100,100,100,10},
    COLOR_HEX = "#74c04b",
    TOOLTIP_SHOW = true,
    VALUE = 16,
}

INJECTED_COUNTER = true
function onload(saved_data)
  CONFIG.VALUE = CONFIG.MAX_VALUE
  Wait.time(createAll, 1, 0)
end
function hexToRGB(hex)
    hex = hex:gsub("#","")
    R = tonumber(hex:sub(1,2),16)/255
    G = tonumber(hex:sub(3,4),16)/255
    B = tonumber(hex:sub(5,6),16)/255
    result = {r=R,g=G,b=B,a=100}
    return result
end
function createAll()
    if CONFIG.TOOLTIP_SHOW then
        ttText = self.getName().. ": " .. CONFIG.VALUE
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end
    local scale = {x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5}
    local thickness = self.getBoundsNormalized().size.y
    if self.name == "Custom_Tile" then
        thickness = thickness*2
        scale = {0.75, 0.75, 0.75}
    end
    self.createButton({
        label = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE),
        click_function = "doNothing",
        tooltip=ttText,
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,thickness/2,-1.6},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = CONFIG.LABEL_SIZE,
        scale=scale,
        font_color= hexToRGB(CONFIG.COLOR_HEX),
        color = CONFIG.LABEL_BG_COLOR
        })
    self.createButton({
        label=">",
        click_function="add",
        tooltip="+",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0.6, thickness/2, -1.7},
        height=400,
        width=200,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=CONFIG.FONT_SIZE,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
    self.createButton({
        label="<",
        click_function="subtract",
        tooltip="-",
        function_owner=self,
        position={-0.6, thickness/2, -1.7},
        height=400,
        width=200,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=CONFIG.FONT_SIZE,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
    self.createButton({
        label="RESET",
        click_function="reset",
        tooltip="Reset Health",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0, thickness/2, -2.5},
        height=100,
        width=400,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=20,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function doNothing(_obj, _color, alt_click)
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.editInput({value = self.getName()})
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(CONFIG.VALUE + mod, CONFIG.MIN_VALUE), CONFIG.MAX_VALUE)
    if CONFIG.VALUE ~= new_value then
        CONFIG.VALUE = new_value
        updateVal()
    end
end

function add(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    add_subtract(_obj, _color, false)
end

function subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    add_subtract(_obj, _color, true)
end

function reset(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    CONFIG.VALUE = CONFIG.MAX_VALUE
    updateVal()
end

function updateVal()
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE)
        })
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    if CONFIG.TOOLTIP_SHOW then
        ttText = self.getName().. ": " .. CONFIG.VALUE
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

  playerColors = Global.getTable("PLAYER_COLORS")

    position = vector(0,100,0)

end

foo = getObjectFromGUID(deckbox.guid)
  params = {player_color = PlayerColor}
  deckbox.call('openDeckbox', params)
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
  self.interactable = Global.getVar("STATUE_UNLOCK")
end

function chooseCharacter(player, option, id)
  playerColors = Global.getTable("PLAYER_COLORS")
  if playerColors[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a character.")
      return
    end
  end
  params = {
    callback_function = function(deckbox) handleDeckbox(deckbox, player.color) end,
    smooth = false,
    position = vector(0,100,0)
  }
  self.takeObject(params)
end

function handleDeckbox(deckbox, color)
  Wait.frames(function() openDeckbox(deckbox, color) end, 10)
end

function openDeckbox(deckbox, PlayerColor)
foo = getObjectFromGUID(deckbox.guid)
  params = {player_color = PlayerColor}
  deckbox.call('openDeckbox', params)
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
PieceCoordTable = {
    ['Deck'] = vector(0,0,0),
    ['Hero'] = vector(0,0,3),
    ['Sidekick'] = vector(2,0,0),
    ['Hero Health'] = vector(0,0,-5),
    ['Sidekick Health'] = vector(2,0,-5),
    ['Bonus Token'] = vector(-3,0,0)
}

function relocate(player_color)
  position = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().position
  rotation = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().rotation
  offset = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward
  reverse = vector(0,180,0)
  offsetRatio = 10
  dropPoint = position + offset * offsetRatio
  dropPoint.y = 1
  self.setRotation(rotation + reverse)
  self.setPosition(dropPoint)
end

function onRandomize(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
  --unloadContents(player_color)
end

function onDrop(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
end

function openDeckbox(params)
  relocate(params.player_color)
  unloadContents(params.player_color)
end

function unloadContents(player_color)
  contents = self.getObjects()
  count = #contents
  origin = self.getPosition()
  stackHeights = {
    ['Deck'] = 0,
    ['Hero'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick'] = 0,
    ['Hero Health'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick Health'] = 0,
    ['Bonus Token'] = 0
  }
  sidekickHealth = 0
  for i,v in ipairs(contents) do
    if contents[i].description == 'Sidekick Health' then
      sidekickHealth = 2
    end
  end
  while (#self.getObjects() > 0) do
    objects = self.getObjects()
    nextObject = objects[1]
    objDesc = nextObject.description
    mod = PieceCoordTable[objDesc]

    stackHeights[objDesc] = stackHeights[objDesc] + 1
    if(objDesc == 'Hero Health') then
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * (mod.x - sidekickHealth)
    else
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * mod.x
    end
    yMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().up * (mod.y + stackHeights[objDesc])
    zMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward * mod.z
    newPosition = origin + xMod + yMod + zMod
    newRotation = objDesc == 'Deck' and self.getRotation() + vector(0,0,180) or self.getRotation()
    newPiece = self.takeObject({
      position          = newPosition,
      index             = 0,
      rotation          = newRotation
    })
    --Global.call("addPiece", {piece = newPiece})
  end
    destroyObject(self)

    -- Bag or Deck returns {{string name, string description, string guid, int index, string lua_script, string lust_script_state}, ...}
end

function vectorAdd(v1, v2)
  X = v1[1] + v2[1]
  Y = v1[2] + v2[2]
  Z = v1[3] + v2[3]
  return vector(X,Y,Z)
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
  self.interactable = Global.getVar("STATUE_UNLOCK")
end

function chooseCharacter(player, option, id)
  playerColors = Global.getTable("PLAYER_COLORS")
  if playerColors[player.color] == nil then
    do
      print("ERROR: Choose a color before you select a character.")
      return
    end
  end
  params = {
    callback_function = function(deckbox) handleDeckbox(deckbox, player.color) end,
    smooth = false,
    position = vector(0,100,0)
  }
  self.takeObject(params)
end

function handleDeckbox(deckbox, color)
  Wait.frames(function() openDeckbox(deckbox, color) end, 10)
end

function openDeckbox(deckbox, PlayerColor)
foo = getObjectFromGUID(deckbox.guid)
  params = {player_color = PlayerColor}
  deckbox.call('openDeckbox', params)
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
PieceCoordTable = {
    ['Deck'] = vector(0,0,0),
    ['Hero'] = vector(0,0,3),
    ['Sidekick'] = vector(2,0,0),
    ['Hero Health'] = vector(0,0,-5),
    ['Sidekick Health'] = vector(2,0,-5),
    ['Bonus Token'] = vector(-3,0,0)
}

function relocate(player_color)
  position = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().position
  rotation = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().rotation
  offset = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward
  reverse = vector(0,180,0)
  offsetRatio = 10
  dropPoint = position + offset * offsetRatio
  dropPoint.y = 1
  self.setRotation(rotation + reverse)
  self.setPosition(dropPoint)
end

function onRandomize(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
  --unloadContents(player_color)
end

function onDrop(player_color)
  --relocate(player_color)
end

function openDeckbox(params)
  relocate(params.player_color)
  unloadContents(params.player_color)
end

function unloadContents(player_color)
  contents = self.getObjects()
  count = #contents
  origin = self.getPosition()
  stackHeights = {
    ['Deck'] = 0,
    ['Hero'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick'] = 0,
    ['Hero Health'] = 0,
    ['Sidekick Health'] = 0,
    ['Bonus Token'] = 0
  }
  sidekickHealth = 0
  for i,v in ipairs(contents) do
    if contents[i].description == 'Sidekick Health' then
      sidekickHealth = 2
    end
  end
  while (#self.getObjects() > 0) do
    objects = self.getObjects()
    nextObject = objects[1]
    objDesc = nextObject.description
    mod = PieceCoordTable[objDesc]

    stackHeights[objDesc] = stackHeights[objDesc] + 1
    if(objDesc == 'Hero Health') then
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * (mod.x - sidekickHealth)
    else
      xMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().right * mod.x
    end
    yMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().up * (mod.y + stackHeights[objDesc])
    zMod = Player[player_color].getHandTransform().forward * mod.z
    newPosition = origin + xMod + yMod + zMod
    newRotation = objDesc == 'Deck' and self.getRotation() + vector(0,0,180) or self.getRotation()
    newPiece = self.takeObject({
      position          = newPosition,
      index             = 0,
      rotation          = newRotation
    })
    --Global.call("addPiece", {piece = newPiece})
  end
    destroyObject(self)

    -- Bag or Deck returns {{string name, string description, string guid, int index, string lua_script, string lust_script_state}, ...}
end

function vectorAdd(v1, v2)
  X = v1[1] + v2[1]
  Y = v1[2] + v2[2]
  Z = v1[3] + v2[3]
  return vector(X,Y,Z)
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
CONFIG = {
    MIN_VALUE = 0,
    MAX_VALUE = 6,
    FONT_COLOR = {0,0,0,100},
    FONT_SIZE = 450,
    LABEL_SIZE = 400,
    LABEL_FONT_COLOR = {0,0,0,100},
    LABEL_BG_COLOR = {100,100,100,10},
    COLOR_HEX = "#f38a29",
    TOOLTIP_SHOW = true,
    VALUE = 6,
}

INJECTED_COUNTER = true
function onload(saved_data)
  CONFIG.VALUE = CONFIG.MAX_VALUE
  Wait.time(createAll, 1, 0)
end
function hexToRGB(hex)
    hex = hex:gsub("#","")
    R = tonumber(hex:sub(1,2),16)/255
    G = tonumber(hex:sub(3,4),16)/255
    B = tonumber(hex:sub(5,6),16)/255
    result = {r=R,g=G,b=B,a=100}
    return result
end
function createAll()
    if CONFIG.TOOLTIP_SHOW then
        ttText = self.getName().. ": " .. CONFIG.VALUE
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end
    local scale = {x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5}
    local thickness = self.getBoundsNormalized().size.y
    if self.name == "Custom_Tile" then
        thickness = thickness*2
        scale = {0.75, 0.75, 0.75}
    end
    self.createButton({
        label = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE),
        click_function = "doNothing",
        tooltip=ttText,
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,thickness/2,-1.6},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = CONFIG.LABEL_SIZE,
        scale=scale,
        font_color= hexToRGB(CONFIG.COLOR_HEX),
        color = CONFIG.LABEL_BG_COLOR
        })
    self.createButton({
        label=">",
        click_function="add",
        tooltip="+",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0.6, thickness/2, -1.7},
        height=400,
        width=200,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=CONFIG.FONT_SIZE,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
    self.createButton({
        label="<",
        click_function="subtract",
        tooltip="-",
        function_owner=self,
        position={-0.6, thickness/2, -1.7},
        height=400,
        width=200,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=CONFIG.FONT_SIZE,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
    self.createButton({
        label="RESET",
        click_function="reset",
        tooltip="Reset Health",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0, thickness/2, -2.5},
        height=100,
        width=400,
        alignment = 3,
        scale=scale,
        font_size=20,
        font_color={0,0,0,0},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function doNothing(_obj, _color, alt_click)
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.editInput({value = self.getName()})
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(CONFIG.VALUE + mod, CONFIG.MIN_VALUE), CONFIG.MAX_VALUE)
    if CONFIG.VALUE ~= new_value then
        CONFIG.VALUE = new_value
        updateVal()
    end
end

function add(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    add_subtract(_obj, _color, false)
end

function subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    add_subtract(_obj, _color, true)
end

function reset(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    CONFIG.VALUE = CONFIG.MAX_VALUE
    updateVal()
end

function updateVal()
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE)
        })
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    if CONFIG.TOOLTIP_SHOW then
        ttText = self.getName().. ": " .. CONFIG.VALUE
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(CONFIG.VALUE),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

    end
  end
  Global.call("SetBoard", {bag = bagGUID, scale = fullScale})
end
